Fastmetrics API integration platform providing database driven screen pops.
metricCRMconnect integrates with back-office applications using APIs [Salesforce.com, Zendesk, etc.]
By leveraging APIs the Fastmetrics app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
